function Main() { function handleEditAvatarClick() { document.querySelector('.popup-edit-avatar').classList.add('popup_opened') } function handleEditProfileClick() { document.querySelector('.popup-edit-profile').classList.add('popup_opened') } function handleAddPlaceClick() { document.querySelector('.popup-add-card').classList.add('popup_opened') } return (

) } export default Main
